entries.title: Police seize bedding from Idaho stabbing suspect's home
entries.description: Investigators seized stained bedding, strands of what looked like hair and a single glove when they searched the Washington state apartment of a graduate student charged with stabbing four University of Idaho students to death

entries.title: Heavy snowstorm slams Denver, takes aim on Plains, Midwest, Northeast
entries.description: A rare mid-January heavy snowstorm is slamming Denver.

entries.title: Another North Carolina electrical substation damaged by gunfire
entries.description: An electrical substation in North Carolina has been damaged by gunfire, marking the third incident where a substation was damaged since November.

entries.title: 2 American citizens killed in Nepal plane crash
entries.description: Two U.S. citizens and two permanent U.S. residents were among those killed in the plane crash in Nepal.

entries.title: Biden again avoids questions on classified documents special counsel
entries.description: President Joe Biden has not publicly commented on the appointment of a special counsel to investigate the potential mishandling of classified documents.

entries.title: DA to reveal possible charges in Alec Baldwin's fatal film shooting Thursday
entries.description: A decision on whether any charges will be filed in the 2021 fatal shooting on the New Mexico set of Alec Baldwin's film "Rust" will be revealed on Thursday.

entries.title: Jury selection begins for 3 in rapper XXXTentacion's slaying
entries.description: More than four years after gunmen killed emerging rap star XXXTentacion during a robbery outside a South Florida motorcycle shop, three suspects are on trial

entries.title: Parents vent frustration at school board in wake of 6-year-old shooting teacher
entries.description: Parents, teachers and community members shared frustrations with community leaders after the third shooting on Newport News school grounds in the last 18 months.

entries.title: Derek Chauvin asks judge to throw out murder convictions in George Floyd's death
entries.description: Derek Chauvin asks to throw out murder convictions in Wednesday.

entries.title: Mental health expert questions forced hospitalization of New York's homeless
entries.description: A New York City mental health expert speaks with ABC News' "Start Here," podcast about the controversial plan to involuntarily hospitalize mentally ill homeless people.

entries.title: Georgia state trooper shot, another man killed in Atlanta
entries.description: Authorities say a Georgia state trooper was shot and injured and another man was killed in an exchange of gunfire Wednesday morning in Atlanta

entries.title: OSHA cites Amazon for workplace conditions that were causing serious physical harm
entries.description: OSHA cited Amazon for failing to furnish a place of employment that was free from recognized hazards that were causing serious physical harm to employees.

entries.title: Microsoft is laying off 10,000 workers amid tech downturn
entries.description: The layoffs at Microsoft will affect nearly 5% of the company's global workforce.

entries.title: Trump requests meeting for reinstatement to Facebook
entries.description: Former President Donald Trump is looking to get back on Facebook.

entries.title: Fed's Powell tests positive for COVID, has 'mild' symptoms
entries.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has tested positive for COVID-19 and is experiencing “mild symptoms,” the Federal Reserve announced

entries.title: Mom sentenced to 40 years for killing 8-year-old son
entries.description: She suffocated her young son and then setting their house on fire.

entries.title: Fed's Mester: Rate hikes have begun to quell US inflation
entries.description: However, further rate hikes are still needed to decisively crush it, she said.

entries.title: Job cuts in tech sector spread, Microsoft lays off 10,000
entries.description: The company said it will also be making changes to its hardware portfolio.

entries.title: Husband accused of killing wife allegedly Googled '10 ways to dispose of a dead body'
entries.description: A Massachusetts man accused of killing his wife, Ana Walshe, 39, who was reported missing Jan. 4, appeared in court Wednesday morning.

entries.title: Wholesale inflation in US slowed further in December to 6.2%
entries.description: It's the sixth straight monthly slowdown and a hopeful sign.

entries.title: WATCH:  Dogs and cats blessed outside Madrid church
entries.description: Pet owners have their dogs and cats blessed outside a Madrid church to celebrate the Feast of Saint Anthony of Abbot, Spain's patron saint of animals.

entries.title: New photographs of Warsaw Ghetto found in family collection
entries.description: The photographs were taken in secret during the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising of 1943.

entries.title: Planned Parenthood set on fire just 2 days after state passes abortion rights law
entries.description: Police are hunting for a person involved in an arson attack at a Planned Parenthood clinic in Illinois just two days after enacting major abortion protections into law.

entries.title: Relatives protest slow autopsy of Nepal plane crash victims
entries.description: "It has been four days, but no one is listening to us," a family member said.

entries.title: Church of England refuses to back same-sex marriage
entries.description: It will allow blessings for same-sex, civil marriages for the first time.

entries.title: Party City, amid rising prices, seeks bankruptcy protection
entries.description: The company struggled with rising prices and a pullback in customer spending.

entries.title: Police in Georgia arrest suspect in Mall of America shooting
entries.description: The fatal shooting happened in December at the Mall of America.

entries.title: Family believes American lawyer who died in Mexico was 'victim of a brutal crime'
entries.description: U.S. citizen Elliot Blair was found dead at a Mexican resort on Jan. 14.

entries.title: Trial set to resume this week for David Barnes, American detained in Russia
entries.description: The trial of American David Barnes, who's being held in Russia on allegations that weren't substantiated by U.S. authorities, is scheduled to resume this week.

entries.title: WATCH:  Marine dad surprises son at football practice after months long deployment
entries.description: The surprise didn’t leave a dry eye on the field.

entries.title: Escaped tiger in South Africa found and euthanized
entries.description: A tiger that escaped from a private farm in South Africa and attacked a man and killed two dogs and a pig while on the loose for days has been euthanized

entries.title: World’s oldest known person, French nun, dies at 118
entries.description: A French nun who was believed to be the world’s oldest person has died shortly before her 119th birthday

entries.title: 4 dead, 1 injured after small plane crashes in Texas
entries.description: Four members of Tennessee's Harvest Church were killed and one was hospitalized after a small plane crash near Victoria, Texas.

entries.title: UK inflation eases for a 2nd month, falling to 10.5%
entries.description: U.K. inflation eased for a second month in December, boosting confidence that the cost-of-living crisis has peaked

entries.title: Quake shakes east Indonesia, south Philippines; no tsunami
entries.description: A magnitude 7.0 earthquake shook eastern Indonesia and southern Philippines, with no damage immediately reported and no tsunami warning issued

entries.title: Fire kills 3 at German nursing home
entries.description: Police are searching for the cause of a fire that killed three in a psychiatric nursing home in southern Germany

entries.title: Polar bear kills woman and young boy after rampage through remote Alaska village
entries.description: A polar bear chased down and killed a woman and a young boy when it entered a remote village in Alaska before a resident shot and killed the bear during the attack.

entries.title: Court to hear appeal of ex-officer in murder of George Floyd
entries.description: An attorney for Derek Chauvin is expected to ask an appeals court to throw out the former Minneapolis police officer's convictions in the murder of George Floyd

entries.title: Walker campaign staffer lawsuit says GOP activist groped him
entries.description: A staffer on Herschel Walker's Republican Senate campaign has filed a lawsuit against prominent conservative activist Matt Schlapp, accusing Schlapp of groping him during a car ride in Georgia before last year’s midterm election

entries.title: Threats to Congress decreased after record high in 2021, but still concerning: Police
entries.description: Reported threats to members of Congress in 2022 declined by more than 2,000 from 2021, according to statistics released on Tuesday by the U.S. Capitol Police

entries.title: Va. Senate Democrats kill effort to repeal electric car rule
entries.description: Virginia Senate Democrats have defeated several Republican efforts to repeal a law that aims to reduce carbon pollution through the adoption of California’s stringent rules for vehicle emissions

entries.title: US set to drop charges that NYPD officer spied for China
entries.description: Prosecutors are dropping charges against a New York City police officer and military veteran who was accused of helping the Chinese government keep tabs on Tibetans in the U.S. A court date is scheduled for Thursday in Brooklyn after federal prosecutor...

entries.title: Biden White House faces transparency questions as document drama continues
entries.description: President Joe Biden continued to avoid answering reporters' questions Tuesday on his ongoing classified document drama as the White House faces questions of transparency.

entries.title: WATCH:  Greta Thunberg hauled away by police at German mine protest
entries.description: Climate activist Greta Thunberg and other protesters were carried away by German police during demonstrations against the destruction of a village to make way for the expansion of a coal mine.

entries.title: WATCH:  Mini horse waits for ice cream in back seat of car at McDonald's drive-thru
entries.description: A person waiting for their order at a McDonald's drive-thru was joined by an unexpected fellow customer: a small horse waiting patiently in the back seat of a car for ice cream.

entries.title: 3 get life in slaying of guard over mask order
entries.description: A married couple and their son convicted of first-degree premeditated murder in the fatal shooting of a security guard who demanded the woman’s daughter wear a mask while shopping have been sentenced to life in prison without parole

entries.title: Prosecutors won't seek death penalty for alleged El Paso Walmart shooter
entries.description: Prosecutors will not seek the death penalty for Patrick Crusius, the alleged El Paso Walmart shooter.

entries.title: Golden State Warriors return to White House as NBA champs after avoiding Trump
entries.description: The East Room ceremony for the Warriors was attended by players' families, Bay Area music legends like E-40, Joe Biden and Kamala Harris and more

entries.title: North Dakota weighs ban of 'sexually explicit' library books
entries.description: Amid a national wave of attempted book banning on LGBTQ subject matter, a North Dakota House panel heard arguments on a bill that would prohibit “sexually explicit” content – including depictions of sexual or gender identity – from public libraries, an...
